    "order_id" : "number eg :1", //seharusnya tidak ada di input tapi kalkulasi di result json
    "shift_no" : "number eg : 1",
    "no_mo" : "string|eg : 179/PILOC/XII/2021",
    "part_mo" : "string|eg : 20-0G49BI",
    "part_name" : "string|eg : HOUSING VT01 RH",
    "part_category" : "string|eg : RH",
    "target_production" : "number eg : 100",
    "cycle_time" : "number eg : 30",
    "start_production" : "time hours eg : 30:00 / hh:ii",
    "finish_production" : "time hours eg : 30:00 / hh:ii",
    "work_hours" : "number eg : 30"
}
